backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing Prisoner’s Dilemma logic with configurable payoff matrix, one-shot/repeated simulations, history tracking, and basic equilibrium analysis.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated feature-to-file mapping describing implemented UI features, components, and confidence data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in layout, sections, styling, and interactive logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions creating a light/dark corporate color system with OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theme provider and rendering the main Prisoner’s Dilemma page with a toaster.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying attribution, current year, and a tracked link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Sticky responsive navigation bar with smooth scrolling and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/features/analytics/analytic: Provides functions to compute expected values and risk metrics for each firm's strategies based on a payoff matrix.
frontend/src/features/analytics/Business: Analytics panel toggling advanced payoff analysis with heatmaps, expected values, and risk metrics.
frontend/src/features/content/BusinessAp: Renders a section describing real-world business scenarios that mirror the Prisoner's Dilemma.
frontend/src/features/content/ConceptsSe: Displays an overview of key Prisoner's Dilemma concepts including players, actions, payoffs, and strategic principles.
frontend/src/features/content/HeroSectio: Defines the hero section with introductory text, examples, and a button that scrolls to the simulation area.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Cumulati: Draws an SVG line chart showing cumulative profits for both firms across simulation rounds.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Shows simulation summary statistics and visualizations, including cooperation rates and profit charts.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/RoundsHi: Displays a scrollable table listing each round's actions, payoffs, and cumulative profits.
frontend/src/features/insights/InsightsS: Displays strategic insights by analyzing the payoff matrix and simulation results, showing Nash equilibria and profit comparisons.
frontend/src/features/insights/interpret: Generates narrative business-focused interpretations of simulation outcomes based on cooperation rate and game type.
frontend/src/features/payoff/payoffAnaly: Computes dominant strategies and Nash equilibria from a payoff matrix and produces an explanatory summary.
frontend/src/features/payoff/PayoffMatri: Renders an interactive payoff matrix with editable values and highlights Nash equilibria using payoff analysis.
frontend/src/features/payoff/usePayoffMa: Fetches and updates the payoff matrix via backend actor calls using React Query.
frontend/src/features/prisonersDilemma/P: Main page composing all sections of the Prisoner's Dilemma interface including simulation, insights, and analytics.
frontend/src/features/simulation/Simulat: Provides UI controls for configuring and running one-shot or repeated game simulations with strategy selection.
frontend/src/features/simulation/strateg: Defines available decision strategies for simulations, each with an ID, label, and description.
frontend/src/features/simulation/useSimu: Runs simulations through backend actor methods and stores results while managing loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/state/useGameStore: Defines a Zustand store holding game mode, strategies, rounds, simulation results, and analytics mode with setter functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via react-query, updating when the user's identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating queries are handled in feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, OKLCH theme variables, dark mode tokens, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, issues, and architectural notes for the game theory web app.
